import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' import DataContext from '../Context/Context' import './Apply.css' const Apply = () => { const {name, setName, age, setAge, email, setEmail, discordTag, setDiscordTag, rpExp, setRpExp, ytLink, setYtLink, charBackStory, setCharBackStory, isRulesAgreed, setIsRulesAgreed, submitForm, setAgreed} = useContext(DataContext) return (

Applciation Form

setName(e.target.value)} />
e.target.value <= 60 ? setAge(e.target.value) : null} />
setEmail(e.target.value)} />
setDiscordTag(e.target.value)} />
rpExp < 10 ? setRpExp(e.target.value) : null} />
setCharBackStory(e.target.value)} />
setYtLink(!e.target.value)} />
) } export default Apply
